Job Description:
Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is seeking for one full-time Communication Service Manager to manage and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service and the actions related to the development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute. Created in December 1953, the Pasteur Institute of Cambodia (IPC) is today a scientific research
establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound.

The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5
research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training. Under the hierarchical authority of the Director, the Communication Service Manager has the responsibility to manage and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service and the actions related to the
development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute.

* MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES

Operation and organization of the service
- Follow and adapt the strategic orientations of the Communication Service in compliance with the organizational strategic orientation
- Manage, plan and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service on a daily routine activities
- Periodically assess the activities of the Communication Department and identify areas for improvement
- Report about the activities of the Communication Service
- Perform other duties assigned by the Direction in accordant with IPC’s activities 

* Internal, external and event communications tasks for Institut Pasteur du Cambodge

- Develop, propose and ensure the implementation of internal, external and event communication plans in accordance with IPC& communication orientations and priorities
- Monitor the implementation of IPC's internal, external and event communication plans
- Monitor the organization of activities related to internal, external and event communications
- Support the research units in the communication related to their events
- Implement and monitor alerts to update the database of scientific publication and inform the direction
of published stories mentioning by IPC
- Ensure the follow-up of internal and external communication media to be produced and developed
- Ensure scientific communication content can be understood by the general public
- Ensure the permanent updating of the web site and social media
- Contribute to the drafting of written documents (articles, reports, etc.) and production of other media
related to internal and external communications
- Coordinate and verify the use of the various media and communication channels: web site, IPC social networks, brochures, posters…
-Contribute to the design, review and production of IPC scientific reports
-Advise Management on the implementation of the communication strategy
Job Requirement:
* RECRUITMENT CONDITIONS

- Full time with one year Fixed duration contract (renewable and/or modifiable in a permanent contract)
- Available to start: 01 of January 2023

* CANDIDATE PROFILE

- Training and professional experience
- University degree (Bachelor or Master) in communication, journalism, Business communications, Public relations or a related fields is required
- Successful experience in the field of communication and development of partnerships in Cambodia
- Close relations with the local press
- Experience in the health and/or scientific research sector in Cambodia is appreciated 
Required skills
- Good knowledge of the media, press and the environment related to communication and health sector in Cambodia
- Good knowledge of news media, social media
- Good knowledge of the use of the WordPress CMS
- Computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Adobe Creative Suite software)
- Photography skills, Good editorial quality
- Proficiency in written and spoken English
- Proficiency in French and Khmer language (oral and written) is appreciated
- Good scientific culture is a plus
- Sense of leadership and responsibility with good managerial capacity
- Strength of proposals and persuasion
- Autonomy, rigor, integrity, dynamism, interpersonal skills, initiative and innovation
- Team spirit
- Excellent interpersonal skills

The complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work
certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the
originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.

* Deadline: 15 of January 2023
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

job title: Deputy Head of Admin, up to 3,0K
position: Deputy Head of Admin, up to 3,0K
Job Description: • Sets up and develops all admin policies including but not limited to stationary, fixed asset, petty cash policies to facilitate the admin tasks smoothly.• Long-term Organizational Planning Coordination: liaises with HR Division and VCL to develop Admin Strategic Plan, observation, evaluation and solve problems, and improve the productivity. • Develops the department structure, sets JDs/KPIs for each team member, prepares flowchart and administers the workflow standard compliant to the international standard, and redesigns the administrative forms.• Monitors the registration of assets of all projects included HQ and keeps track record of assets into the log book regarding the movement of materials and equipment in order to follow up their useful life.• Performs at least one full count a year and proposes sale of assets that are the over useful life for replacement.• Works with VCL and relevant Project Manager how to register and analyze operating costs of each asset and makes recommendations to management regarding the useful life of the all assets and operating cost reduction.• Site/Project Facilitation to Controls the administration systems, oversees petty cash management, monitors the vehicle management, sets standard payment of OT for workers, inspects the fixed asset controlling system, and work with suppliers to process dress cutting based on MAM Dress Code Policy.• Develops training courses to ensure the effective work of HR/Admin of each site/project, verifies the Performance Appraisal, and examines the PIP for admin staffs.
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree of Business Administration, Economics, or other related fields.• Proven management leadership skills.• Excellent interpersonal and relationship building skills.• Flexibility and ability to work on multiple projects.• Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills, including the ability to coordinate with tough people, facilitate on complicated matters, and adapt to the diverse working environment.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

Job Description:
Job Responsibility

- To effectively participate in and implement yearly Marketing Communication Plan and within budget of the company food chain brands.
- To make sure that promotional campaigns being correctly implemented at the store level such as briefing staff, leaflet distribution, banner hanging, poster placement, etc.
- To follow up and conduct surveys on competitors advertising and promotional activities; do consumer research; and analyze the company promotional campaign results
- To effectively coordinate with franchisors Marketing department for various marketing programs and adapt for Cambodian markets.
- To work closely with graphic designer and production house to deliver high quality work at low cost
- To manage overall media relations for the company achieving of frequent, timely and positive media coverage; and to closely monitor the company media placement.
- To update daily sale report and take action to drive sale within budget of the company.
- To keep records of competitors and company marketing communications, and up-date company marketing expenses
- To organize and participating in Sponsoring activities, and attend at opening nights, press launches, trade shows, public meetings and similar events; and organize leaflet distribution,
- To work closely with Store Managers to come up with Local Store Marketing (LSM) programs for stores in need.

Financial Responsibility

- Responsible for Marketing Expense and review following the annual budget plan


Travel Requirement

- 30% of the time travelling to stores to visit and checking the consistency of the implementation, and traveling to the province.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement

-At least 1-3 years experience in similar position

-Experience with budgets and forecasting
-Strong skill in driving for results
-Strong in people management and development

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.

Company Profile:
Samanea is an Asian company, of Asian talents, by Asian investment, for the prosperity of Asian small businesses and the happiness of Asian consumers.

We develops and runs “Markets”, large-scale trade centres each between 100,000 sqm and 500,000 sqm for wholesale and retail of all kinds of manufactured goods.

Surrounding our Market, we build tenant warehouses, business hotels, office buildings, and the Samanea Convention and Exhibition Centre, to further help boost our tenants' business. We provide a basket of services from cross-border shipping to local apartments for our tenants' foreign staff.

Samanea is a magnet of Asian talents, where hundreds of us gather together to pave the way to business innovation, connection, and expansion.

Job Description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES FOR FRONT DESK:
1. Oversee all aspects of the room division, including the front office and reservations
2. Maximize room revenue and occupancy through effective yield management practices
3. Handle customer complaints and concerns in a professional and efficient manner
4. Conduct regular meetings with department heads to ensure open communication and smooth operations
5. Provide ongoing training and development opportunities for all team members
6. Establishing and maintaining relationships with clients by providing them with information about new products and services, marketing promotions, or special events
7. Managing staff schedules to ensure that there are enough employees on duty at all times to meet customer demand
8. Supervising guest services staff to ensure that all clients receive prompt attention to their needs
9. Responsibilities include greeting clients as they arrive, coordinating their check-in/out to assign rooms, and informing them about the resort’s facilities. 
10. Make sure our front desk staff, including receptionists, customer service, and provide memorable hospitality experiences for our guests.
11. Self-motivated and well-organized individual, with good communication and management skills, and a clear understanding of what the business expects. 
12. Responsible for managing and leading the guest relations team as supporting the operational management of the resort. 
13. Handle the monthly reports and budget for the front office department.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES FOR HOUSEKEEPING:

1. Overseeing the daily operations of housekeeping staff including training, scheduling, and evaluating performance
2. Collaborating with other managers to develop department budgets and plans for growth or change within their organization
3. Ensuring that staff members comply with safety regulations, such as wearing appropriate footwear or using ladders or lifts when needed
4. Creating schedules for cleaning personnel, including assigning tasks and setting deadlines for completion
5. Managing the inventory of cleaning supplies and equipment, ordering supplies as needed, and maintaining records of supplies used
6. Reviewing employee work performance to ensure that it meets standards of quality and efficiency
7. Conducting regular inspections of work areas to ensure that they are clean and safe
8. Coordinating with facility managers to ensure that housekeeping staff has access to supplies and equipment they need to do their jobs efficiently.
9. Schedule and assign work to the housekeeping staff, ensuring adequate coverage of all areas at all times.
10. Inspect guest rooms, public areas, and back-of-the-house areas regularly to ensure they meet   
 established standards of cleanliness and orderliness
11. Investigate complaints regarding housekeeping service and equipment, taking any necessary 
 corrective action
12. Ensure that lost and found items are properly logged, stored, and returned to guests in a   
 timely manner
13. Maintain inventory of cleaning supplies and linens, ordering new supplies as needed
14. Train new housekeeping staff members on proper cleaning techniques, safety procedures, 
 and use of equipment
15. Prepare work schedules and post them in designated areas
16. Able to handle monthly reports.
Job Requirement:
Knowledge and skills:
• Must be able to prioritize work to meet deadlines while handling multiple tasks
• Good English communication, customer service, and interpersonal skills
• Good in leadership, problem-solving, teamwork, and organization.

Required qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in hospitality, business, or a related field
• 5+ years of experience in hotel or resort operations with at least 3 years in management level
• Knowledge of Microsoft Office, the internet, and e-mail.

Other benefits:
•	Food           :   Provided 3 times daily at Moringa restaurant 
•	Accommodation	:   Provided a single room
•	Salary increment	:   Special promotion and yearly performance evaluation
•	Annual Leave	:   18 days/year upon completion of 3 months’ probation
•	National Holiday:   Followed to the Cambodian Labor Law
•	Medical Leave	:   Followed to the Cambodian Labor Law
•	Social Insurance:   National Social Security Fund and pension fund
•	Life Insurance	:   Forte Life Assurance (Cambodia) Plc.
Company Profile:
"vKirirom Pine Resort" is a new concept for enriching people's lives in the future. It is located amongst the pine trees on the top of Kirirom National Park. Our main goal is to provide an atmosphere and location that people can enjoy their lives in the great nature.

We also hope that Kirirom will be the best place for those who want to lead a slow life on the mountain as well as being innovative together. 

With the natural environment of Kirirom Mountain, we offer you the opportunity to experience the life in one with nature that is peaceful and tranquil.

If you are tired of living in city which is full of pollution, then vKirirom Vacation Home will be the best choice for your next home. It may sound far apart from business when saying living on the mountain, but our main purpose is together with nature.

Kirirom Institute of Technology is an Institute-Industry based approach collaborating with entrepreneurs to act upon the fast changing world of technology. We provide high standard of education and higher chances to specialize in leadership development.

Job Description:
1. Communicating with other members of the culinary team to determine ingredient needs, menu items, and preparation methods
2. Supervising and training kitchen staff to ensure efficient operation of the kitchen
3. Preparing food and drink according to recipes and specifications for special events such as weddings or corporate dinners
4. Managing a staff of kitchen employees, including training, scheduling, motivating, and firing
5. Evaluating the taste, texture, and appearance of food items during preparation to ensure they meet quality standards
6. Estimating food costs and creating menus based on food availability and prices
7. Creating new dishes or improving existing ones by experimenting with different ingredients, spices, cooking techniques, or presentation styles
8. Maintaining inventory of ingredients and ordering new supplies as needed
9. Establishing operational standards for the kitchen staff and creating schedules that meet company standards
10. Oversee all aspects of the kitchen, including but not limited to menu development, food preparation, staff management, and inventory control
11. Ensure that all dishes are prepared in a timely manner and meet the highest standards of quality and presentation
12. Train and supervise kitchen staff, including but not limited to line cooks, sous chefs, and dishwashers
13. Create weekly schedules for kitchen staff and ensure that all shifts are adequately covered
14. Order supplies and ingredients as needed, keeping an eye on budget constraints
15. Maintain a clean and well-organized kitchen at all time, in accordance with health and safety regulations
16. Handle customer complaints and feedback in a professional and courteous manner
17. Perform regular cost analysis to ensure that the kitchen is operating within budget
18. Other tasks will be assigned by Operation Director.
Job Requirement:
Knowledge and skills:
• Good command in English communication, and interpersonal skills 
• Creativity and ability to develop new menu items
• Working knowledge of food cost and inventory control
• Good in leadership, problem-solving, teamwork, organization, and time management.

Required qualifications:
• Certification from a culinary arts institute
• Proven experience as a head chef or sous chef in a professional kitchen
• Excellent knowledge of culinary arts, with a focus on healthy and sustainable cuisine
• Strong leadership and management skills
• Ability to delegate tasks and responsibilities to kitchen staff
• Knowledge of Microsoft Office, the internet, and e-mail.

Other benefits:
•	Food		:   Provided 3 times daily at Moringa restaurant

•	Medical Leave	:   Followed to the Cambodian Labor Law
•	Social Insurance:   National Social Security Fund and pension fund
•	Life Insurance	:   Forte Life Assurance (Cambodia) Plc.

job title: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
position: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

•	Plan and design the scope of internal audit working process and procedure in conjunction with the business process, objective and implementation
•	Monitor internal audit testing and projects are conducted on timely basis and follow the working plan and process of specified area and identify reportable issues
•	Review and update the suitability of internal control design
•	Report audit findings and prepare audit report for line manager to review
•	Prepare the update of internal audit policy upon significant change of company operation
•	Support line manager on oversea and monitor risk assessment of assigned department or functional area in established/required timeline
•	Support line manager for establishing Business Continuance Plan (BCP),
•	Develop and update risk management policies and procedures.
•	Work closely with all Head of Departments and other relevant management team.
•	Carry out other duties appropriate to this post as requested by line manager.
Job Requirement:
Position Requirement 

•	Bachelor Degrees or Master degree (is a plus) in finance/audit/risk or related field.
•	At least 3 years experiences combination in internal audit/risk assessment and/or management required
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills, strong knowledge of Cambodia’s internal statutory requirements.
•	Good knowledge in Business and Risk Regulatory
•	Good mix of corporate, commercial and litigation experience
•	Computer literacy
•	Good command in English
•	Ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment, and strong analytical and negotiation skills

Our brands include the Kingdom’s most loved beer – Angkor Premium Beer, Angkor Premium Extra Stout, Klang, Black Panther, Turbog, Carlsberg, Guinness, Pepsi, Angkor Puro and many more. Job Description: About the role:The Head of HR Division is responsible to direct, manage, supervise, and coordinate the activities and operations of the Human Resources Division, including labour relations, recruitment and selection, classification and compensation, training and employee development, employee benefits, workers’ compensation, liability, and safety programs; coordinates assigned activities with other divisions, departments, and outside agencies.Location:•	Head Office, Phnom Penh (01 post)Duties and responsibilities:•	Assume management responsibility for assigned services and activities of the Human Resources division including labour relations, recruitment and selection, classification and compensation, training and employee development, employee benefits, workers’ compensation, liability, and safety programs. •	Manage and participate in the development and implementation of goals, objectives, policies, and priorities for assigned programs; recommend and administer policies and procedures; interpret and apply policies, procedures, rules, and laws in a fair, equitable, and consistent manner. •	Monitor and evaluate the efficiency and effectiveness of service delivery methods and procedures; recommend, within departmental policies, appropriate services, and staffing levels. •	Plan, direct, coordinate and review the work plan for human resources staff; assign work activities, projects, and programs; review and evaluate work products, methods, and procedures; meet with staff to identify and resolve problems. •	Confer with management staff on major human resource issues and activities; provide direction and advice as needed; ensure ABA Bank compliance with all personnel rules and regulations. •	Administer risk management programs, including workers’ compensation, safety, and liability. •	Select, train, motivate and evaluate human resources personnel; provide or coordinate staff training; work with employees to correct deficiencies; implement discipline and termination procedures. •	Oversee and participate in the development and administration of the division’s annual budget; participate in the forecast of funds needed for staffing, equipment, materials and supplies; monitor and approve expenditures; implement adjustments. •	Serve as the liaison for the Human Resources Division with other divisions, departments, and outside agencies; negotiate and resolve sensitive and controversial issues. •	Serve as staff on a variety of boards, commissions, and committees; prepare and present staff reports and other related documents. •	Conduct a variety of organizational and operational studies and investigations; prepare and present recommendations. •	Attend and participate in professional group meetings; stay abreast of new trends and innovations in the field of human resources management. •	Other related tasks as assigned from Chief Human Resources Officer.
Job Requirement: Skills and Specifications:•	Bachelor's Degree required in Human Resources or relevant field (Master's or MBA Degree preferred);•	Five years plus of experience of HR management position;•	Experience working in an organization with 5000 employee is a plus. •	Experience in strategic planning and execution;•	Knowledge of contracting, negotiating, and change management;•	Knowledge of organizational development theory and practices;•	Experience in design, development and implementation of salary administration plans and benefit programs;•	Demonstrated knowledge of multiple human resources disciplines (employee relations, labour relations, performance management, employee communication, recruitment, succession planning, compensation, training, etc.);•	Knowledge of information systems used in human resources applications;•	Ability to motivate teams to produce quality materials within tight timeframes and simultaneously manage several projects.•	Ability to participate in and facilitate group meetings.How to apply:Interested and qualified applicants should submit your updated Cover Letter and CV stating the position applied for with your current photo (4x6) through recruitment@ababank.com
Company Profile: ABA Bank is Cambodia's leading private financial institution (not state-owned enterprise) founded in 1996 as the Advanced Bank of Asia Limited.In over 25 years of development and growth, ABA has significantly strengthened its position in the market and broke into the Top 3 commercial banks of the country. Today, ABA offers the entire spectrum of services to customer segments covering SMEs, micro businesses, and individuals.With 81 branches, 450+ ATMs, 480+ self-banking machines across the country, and advanced online banking and mobile banking platforms ABA Bank reaches out to a large number of customers with an array of modern financial services.

Job Description:
-	Manage effectively the audit team and carrying out audits of all projects of MAM, which cover in Phnom Penh and Province areas as planned.
-	Independently assessing, evaluating and consulting to the management in relation to the internal control system and managing risks to add value and improve the overall business operations of the MAM projects.
-	Examining any weaknesses and/or potential weaknesses in the line management (policy, procedures or operational activities) based on the risk rating (critical or major), which may impact to the business operations of the MAM. If any major weaknesses and / or potential weaknesses, discuss the weaknesses with the line manager.
-	Proposing and updating the Internal Audit Procedures of each assigned project as necessary.
-	Acting as a consultant to all the MAM projects, particularly ensuring that organization, policies, standard operating procedures, accounting principles, business process, risk management, internal control, governance and information systems are appropriately aligned to achieve the MAM goals effectively and efficiently, and in a manner that contains risks to an acceptable level.
-	Being liaison officer to external parties of the MAM in relation to internal audit function.
-	Review the internal audit report and submit to the Head of Internal Audit for final review.
-	Providing coaching note to subordinates upon the review of audit work.
-	Assist Deputy/Head Department for annual audit planning.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor Degree in finance or Accounting, CAT/ACCA, or related fields.
-	Good English writing or Chinese is considered as priority.
-	Experience at least two and three years for Supervisor Audit respectively.
-	Willing to travel and work in provinces for a period of time.
-	Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply for the position of Auditor.
-	Accomplishment of audit work following the schedule as planned. 
-	Good team work with respect of audit ethic.
-	Contribute feedback/idea to the audit department on potential process enhancements where team improvement is possible.
-	Computer Literate (Microsoft office and quick book).

job title: ប្រធានកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរ
position: ប្រធានកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរ
Job Description: តួរនាទីសំខាន់៖	- ទទួលបន្ទុកពង្រឹងបទដ្ឋានអប់រំ និងលើកកម្ពស់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាក្រោមកិច្ចសហការជាមួយគណៈនាយក- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើ របាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សាទាំងអស់ដូចជា ការកំណត់ល្បឿនបង្ហាត់  វិញ្ញសារប្រឡងប្រវត្តិរូបសិស្ស របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និងឯកសារបណ្ណសាររដ្ឋបាល ជាដើម- ទទួលបន្ទុកដោះស្រាយរាល់ការទំនាក់ទំនង និងតម្រូវនានា ជាមួយក្រសួងអប់រំ មន្ទីអប់រំ និងស្ថាប័នដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ- ទទួលបន្ទុកចុះអធិការកិច្ចគ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាខ្មែរគ្រប់មុខវីជ្ជាទាំងអស់យ៉ាងហោចម្តងក្នុងមួយឆមាសដើម្បីពង្រឹង គុណភាអប់រំរបស់គ្រូនិមួយៗ- ទទួលបន្ទុកសម្របសម្រួលសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតគ្រប់ថ្នាកបឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សា និងធានាឲ្យបាននូវដំណើរការដោយរលូននៃថ្នាក់សិក្សានិមួយៗ
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ៖       	- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកអប់រំ ឫបរិញ្ញប័ត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ- វិញ្ញាបនប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងវិស័យអប់រំ ឫវិស័យពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិច 2 ឆ្នាំ- មានសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម- មានជំនាញរដ្ឋបាល និងសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការរៀបចំ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន និងចេះប្រើ Microsoft Officeអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ និងពាក់កណ្តាលថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ - សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

Job Description:
•Conduct Market surveys of targeted areas, regions, channels, and segments. 
•Collaborate with the sales teams of each region/area to gather primary market data based on the 4P’s principle of marketing.
•Survey on the market situation and performance of the company across all dimensions (product, prices, services, etc.) 
•Closely monitor the actual results of the execution of plans and prepare performance reports for each area and region. 
•Forecast future of industry, products, and trends
•Evaluate methods for collecting data, such as surveys, questionnaires, and polls
•Assist in preparing reports and present results and actionable recommendation to commercial team
•Perform duty as assigned
Job Requirement:
•At least having 1 years of experience in research field is encouraged
•Knowledge of statistics
•Knowledge of market research
•Knowledge of business management and strategies
•Strong analytical and critical thinking skills 
•Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•Strong interpersonal skill
•Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•Advanced level in Excel, PowerPoint Internet and Email.
•Flexible to the process flow change
•Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Requirement:
- BA/ MBA in Marketing or Management or Economics
- At least 4-5 years’ experience in marketing, management, analytics.
- Knowledge in Brand/ product / portfolio management
- Marketing management
- Project management
- Business communications
- FinTech/ banking

Job Description:
•  Lead and assist Brand Management team in the development Chip Mong Land’s brand programs and key marketing fundamental plans, such as developing and aligning Business Channel Plans into Brand Plans
•  Coordinate and negotiate with vendors and creative agencies. Organize and create promotional plans for trade activation. 
•  Formulate integrated marketing campaigns to support multi-channel advertisements. Monitor the implementation of each marketing campaign.
•  Provide inputs on consumer markets; monitor market trends and information related to competitors; identify market opportunities and potential areas of development/focus; develop market strategies to gain market share and achieve top line targets for the brand. 
•  Lead the team under supervisor and ensure timely implementation of effective consumer marketing plans, including new product launches in line with brand strategies.
•  Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•  At least 3-4 years of experience in event, marketing, business planning and analysis, and brand building.
•  Project management experiences, Highly organized
•  Knowledge of market research and analysis 
•  Knowledge of business models and strategy
•  Knowledge of Facebook Ads, Google Ads. 
•  Knowledge and understanding of best marketing practices in organizing digital marketing campaign
•  Strong business acumen

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 jobs@cogetel.com.kh Phnom Penh #44, Techo Hun Sen BLvd, Sangkat Chak Angreu Krom, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh 016672267

Job Description:
About this job:

This position is working on managing events such as contacting clients, agencies, designers, influencers, arranging schedules, organizing events, venues, manpower, decoration, and proposing ideas for the events to the management team. Furthermore, you are required to understand how to manage budget plan for cost effectiveness and have good relationships with others. You will be working in Advertising and Event Planning Section, within Marketing and Business Planning Department. You will report your tasks to direct Manager, and General Manager.

Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Managing advertising & events for the Malls 
•	Finding new clients and creating new schemes for generating more income and increase sales
•	Maintaining existing clients, increasing more new clients with effectively communicating and solving problem relate to the events.
Job Requirement:
•	Have experiences relate to event and organizing.
•	Have a bachelor degree in marketing, public relations, or related field.
•	Good at using English for business level.
•	Be a team player and have good behavior. 
•	Be able to propose creative events or attractive activities inside the mall.
•	Support organizing event and support team members.
•	Be able to work with shift schedule. (Including weekend and holiday shift).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

Job Description: • Prepares selection of Project Consultants• Briefs all Consultants on the client’s requirements and coordinates with the Lead Consultant and his team on the Design and other technical matters.• Conducts Client-Consultant Meetings and ensures flow of documentation/information is controlled.• Prepares the Development Schedule for the Project.• Reviews with Consultant QS on Cost Plans for Project with updates.• Liaises with Consultants on the provision of documents for the various submissions to authorities to ensure timely approval according to schedule.• Coordinates with Consultants to ensure calling and the award of tenders for various packages is done according to schedule and with the proper documentations and monitor the tendering process and tendering evaluation.• Establishes the contract administration procedures.• Prepares the Project Quality Plan and disseminates to Consultants, Contractors and Supervising Staff.• Monitors the Contractors ‘submissions and comments/replies by Construction Manager/Consultants• Ensures various critical milestones are incorporated in the Contractors’ programmes and are executed accordingly and to proper procedures.• Keeps track of the issued and potential variation orders and other controls to ensure that the project completes within budget.• Checks all payment claims by contractors and recommends for approval/payment.• Prepares monthly reports on site progress and other pertinent issues to the Employer.• Monitors various quality/safety control measures on site. Keeps tracks that all regulatory requirements to be adhered to by Contractors are followed.• Conducts regular meetings with Contractors on progress and other matters.• Ensures all procedures of handing over are complied with according to authorities and the Client’s requirements.• Monitors feedback on defects after handing over and the execution of the rectification works to address the complaints/defects.
Job Requirement: • Good attitude and energy level• Good communication• Good in budget planning• Good in management skill• Fluency English and other language is a plus• Proven experience as Project Manager or relevant role• Demonstrable competency in strategic project planning• Working knowledge of data analysis and performance/operation metrics• Working knowledge of IT/Business infrastructure and MS Office• Outstanding organizational and leadership abilities• Excellent interpersonal and public speaking skills• Aptitude in decision-making and problem-solving• BSc in Engineering; MSc/MBA is a plus• Company condition:• + Working days: Monday – Saturday• + Working hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM• + Lunch time 12 PM – 1 PM• + Public holiday complies labor law• + Annual Leaves and Sick leaves• + Salary: Negotiate + Allowance• 📍Location: D'Seaview, Block A, A-05-01, St 115, Phum 1, Sangkat 3, Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia• If you are interested, please submit your CV @ helenp@jeweladevelopment.com
Company Profile: Jewel a development Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
•	Management of daily accounting operations in compliance with local accounting standards and the group policy.
•	Supervising the accounts receivable and accounts payable teams to ensure all tasks are allocated respectively.
•	Producing as well various accounting reports and financial statements with the group deadline for management to review.
•	Coordinate and liaise with auditors on audit, tax and other relevant matters and assist in reviewing the current operation to align with group accounting procedures.
•	Assess the impact of legislative and other changes.
•	Handle all ad-hoc requests in relation to the operational management accounting process.
•	Other duties assigned by management team.
•	Process the payments to vendor by interest banking.
Job Requirement:
•	At least Bachelor degree in Accounting/Finance or relevant qualification.
•	Work experience with accounting field at least 3 years.
•	Preferably holding Diploma of Cambodia Tax or Tax Agent.
•	Professional qualification from a recognized Accountancy body.
•	Preferably experience in dealing with Qualified Investment Project (QIP).
•	Preferable with Financial management and group consolidation experience.
•	Excellent collaboration and communication skills with strong proficiency in written and spoken English.
•	Be self-motivated and able to work to tight deadlines.
•	Have good computer skill (Microsoft office, SAP or other accounting system, internet and email).
•	Creative and flexible in work, be able to work effectively and cooperatively with co-workers.
•	Be able to work with shift schedule (including weekend and holiday shift).

Job Description:
•	Tracks sales data and works to achieve sales team goals.  
•	Communicate with tenant related to Sales & Marketing Activities. 
•	Contributes information, ideas, and research to help develop marketing strategies. 
•	Research and collects trends, data, demographics, pricing strategies, and other information that can potentially improve marketing and sales performance. 
•	Creates and presents regular performance reports for management. 
•	Keep yourself updated with each tenant’s sales and promotion activity. 
•	Implements and adheres to company policies and procedures.
•	Maintains excellent relationships with tenants and other departments. 
•	Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement:
•	At least 1 years’ experience in related Sale &Marketing, Hospitality, Food and Beverage Industrial and retail store business.    
•	Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Business or a Related Fields. 
•	Knowledge in Digital Marketing, Social Media and Microsoft Office. 
•	Knowledge in making data analysis reports and fluent in Presentation Skill. 
•	Be challenging, self-motivated, problem solving and able to work under pressure.
•	Goal driven and be able to work with flexible working schedule.

Job Description:

• Ability to think creatively and innovatively
• Ability to work under pressure

Job Description:
• Perform sales duties and assist with overall sales tasks.

• Bachelor’s degree in Business Management, Sales and Marketing or related fields.

• Strong attention to detail and excellent organization skills.
• Good negotiation and persuasion skills, interpersonal and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to manage and influence team members.
• Be friendly, flexible, hard-working, and able to work under the pressure.
• Ability to use Microsoft Office programs including, Word and Excel, Outlook, PPT, etc.
• Strong interpersonal skills with a positive attitude toward working with the team.
• Ability to handle customers efficiently.
• Ability to communicate well in written and verbal Khmer and English.
• Good morale and integrity.

Job Description:
LOCATION​:​Phnom Penh
BENEFIT​:​Seniority, Insurance, and other attractive benefits.
SALARY​:​Competitive

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES​
• Developing procurement strategies that are inventive and cost-effective.
• Communicating supplies, wholesales and retails, regarding the products, i.e. prices, return, expiry date etc.
• Process procurement for purchasing materials for supporting organizational projects.
• Do and revise contracts with suppliers
• Order materials from suppliers to support projects.
• Adjusting unit prices according supplies changes
• Visiting markets to look for different products make recommendation
• Keeping important documents regarding to product such vendor agreements, daily work, catalogs of new item etc.
• Gathering information regarding customers/users' reactions and feedbacks on products
• Ensure quality standards met through administration purchasing complaints resolutions provided by using fields.
• Oversee and train logistics team
• Do monthly logistic report to Deputy Director/Executive Director
• Ensure the logistics records/reports are properly maintained in a secured environment.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree Administrative/Accounting or equivalent qualification.
- Minimum 3-4 year experience of Administrative/Procurement, Accounting.
- Experience using supply chain management software and tools, including S.A.P
- Preferably, experience working NGOs/INGOs.
- Fluency written spoken English Khmer.
- Management and leadership skills.
- Computer literacy (Microsoft Word, Excel, and Power Point Presentation).
- Willingness to work across cultures and department in an interactive team setting.
- Good interpersonal, organizational team building skills.
- Honest, proactive, hard- working, patient.
- Able work under tight deadlines a stress environment/under pressure.


@ HOW TO APPLY:

- If you are interested, please submit your CV & Cover Letter with your SALARY EXPECTATION to detail information below:
o The subject of email shall be a Procurement Manager To: hrm@smilinggecko-cambodia.org; hrd@smilinggecko-cambodia.org
o Address: #4, St.490. Sangkat Phsar Doeum Thkov, Khan Chamcarmon, Phnom Penh
o Contact Number: 012/069 447 445
Note! Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Job Description:

**Responsibilities and Duties:
• Be humility, patience, acceptance 
● Attend and actively participate in trainings to learn about a variety of topics related to personal, and professional growth, as well as policies and procedures.
• Complete daily and weekly receptionist duties, achieving the high reception standards of Go Gym, as assigned. This may include, but is not limited to:
• Greet and welcome guests as soon as they arrive at the gym with smile
• Monitor hygiene, cleanliness, and comfortable environment in the front office
• Be familiar with property safety, first aid and fire and emergency procedures and enforce these within the gym.
• Class booking reservation and supplies inventory
• Answer, screen and forward incoming phone calls

• keep inventory of stock
• Keep updated records of expenses and costs
• Deal with special requests from guests
• Document processing and daily reports
• Dealing with bookings by phone, e-mail, face-to-face.
• Completing procedures when guests arrive and leave.
• Handing out keys check in/out
• Preparing bills and taking payments
• Dealing with complaints or problems
• Do other tasks as required by management team
Job Requirement:
• Fluent in Khmer: written and spoken, and Can Speak English. 
• (Word, Excel, E-mail  type in Unicode
• Proficient computer skills (Word, Excel, and E-mail, type in Unicode).
• Ability to remain calm, composed and flexible in a busy and demanding environment.
• Work well on a team, and in an intercultural environment
• Ability to remember a large amount of information (details) and process complicated systems.
• Shall be to solve the problem, willing to learn new task and self-motivating.
• Good organizational, administrative and communication skills.

position: បុគ្គលិក 3D Design
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
• បុគ្គលិក 3D Design មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគូរគ្រឿងតាមការបែងចែករបស់ប្រធានក្រុម ហើយធានាអោយបាននូវការគូរគ្រឿងមានគុណភាព និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• ទទួលក្រដាសបញ្ជីពីប្រធានក្រុម យកមកពិនិត្យ និងសង្កេតមើលពីម្រិតនៃគ្រឿងមុនពេលដំណើរការគូរ
• ពង្រាងគ្រោងគ្រឿងដែលមិនទាន់ពេញលក្ខណៈអោយមានលក្ខណៈពេញលេញវិញ
• ស្រាវជ្រាវទាក់ទងនឹងគំរូម៉ូតដែលមិនទាន់មានជាគំរូ ដើម្បីយកមកច្នៃជាគំរូម៉ូតតាមការចង់បានរបស់ភ្ញៀវ
• គូរគ្រឿងក្នុងកម្មវិធី Matrix ទៅតាមបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការ Design នៃមូលដ្ឋានគ្រឹៈគ្រឿង និងកែសម្រួលតាមការចង់បានរបស់ភ្ញៀវ
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការណែនាំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
• ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារក្នុងក្រុម
Job Requirement:
Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• កម្រិតសិក្សាយ៉ាងតិចមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ
• ផ្តល់អាទិភាពសម្រាប់អ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍ 

Skill (ជំនាញ):
• ជំនាញផ្នែកកុំព្យូទ័រ ជាពិសេដ Matrix, AutoCAD 2D 3D, Sketch up, Autodesk, 3D Max, Rhino 
• ចេះវិភាគ

Physical Fitness (កាយសម្បទា):
• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• ស្មារតីវាងវៃ រហ័សរហួន
• អាយុយ៉ាងច្រើន ២៧ ឆ្នាំ

Personal Characteristics (បុគ្គលិកលក្ខិណៈផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន):
• ម៉ត់ចត់ និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ   ស្លូតបូត 
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម 
• មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត
• អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ និងស្ថានភាពស្តេស
• ធ្វើការឯករាជ្យ និងក្រុម

Job Description:  Negotiation of imported materials with emphasis on demand and supply planning and delivery scheduling of cargos and daily interface with the authorities.  Cross train in all areas, including demand and supply forecast and delivery scheduling, inventory management, shipping, system and procedure development. Make adjustments to cargo forecasts delivery schedule and nominations based on operational circumstances. Communicate cargo forecast and schedule adjustments with the relevant internal and 3rd parties.  Actively monitor, maintain, analyse daily and monthly reports and reconcile and settle final inventory entries.  Assist with developing and documenting other purchasing policies and procedures as well as the related software tools which are used in the Logistic Department. Selecting carriers and negotiating contracts and rates. Planning and monitoring inbound and outgoing deliveries. Organizing warehouse, label goods, plot routes, and process shipments. Responding to any issues or complaints. Researching ideal shipping techniques, routing, and carriers. Working day by day with other BUs to incorporate logistics with department procedures and operations. Evaluating budgets and expenditures. Updating and evaluating metrics to assess performance and implement enhancements. Ensuring all operations adhere to laws, guidelines. Keeping shipping operations within budget without compromising speed or efficiency. Processing shipment documentation and inspecting completed orders. Creating and implementing shipping policies and procedures. Training, and supervising logistic employees. Any other tasks assign by Deputy CEO.
Job Requirement:  Bachelor degree or above in Logistics or Supply Chain field. 3+ years of Cargo Scheduling experience 3+ years of demand and supply planning and scheduling Knowledge of Cargo/Shipping/Logistic policies and procedures Be confident, assertive and independent. Excellent communication and negotiation skill. Critical thinker and problem-solving skills Good time-management and interpersonal skills Hands on experience in budgeting and reporting Good command of speaking, reading and writing in English. Be able to travel.

Job Description:
** The Employee is responsible for:
- Perform preparation and review of internal and regulatory reports.
- Ensure continual enhancements to models to automate and optimise efficiency / accuracy to minimise manual processes / errors and model run time.
- Perform preparation and review of experience analyses / studies as well as assumptions reviews and updates. 
- Ensure all analyses / studies / methodology and assumptions reviews and updates are complete, accurate, consistent and use appropriate and/or commonly accepted methodologies.
- Ensure continual enhancements to experience studies for more granular / detailed analyses where there is statistically credible data available, as well as to improve consistency of approaches / methodologies used for different risk factors.
- Involvement in IFRS17 implementation
- Support in other departmental functions, as needed.
Preferred Skills and Experience:
- Good knowledge and use of Excel. (VBA knowledge is an advantage)
- Experience in using Prophet or other actuarial software. (coding experience in Prophet is an advantage)
- Good knowledge and experience in related aspects of actuarial work in a life insurance company, such as financial reporting bases, profit signatures, valuation
data and processes, actuarial and life policy admin systems, experience studies and strategic planning.
- Able to communicate and work well across functions in the company.
- Able to work independently, keen to learn and willing to develop junior actuaries.
- Good progress in actuarial exams.
Job Requirement:
3. WORKING RELATIONSHIPS
* Internal interface
- Report directly to the Actuarial Manager/ Appointed Actuary or such other person as the Company may direct from time to time.
- Work closely with other team members, other departments and Regional Head Office.
- Coordinate and communicate with other departments and regulators.
Company Profile:
We are one of the leading Japanese Life Insurance company with more than 100 years of history in the life insurance industry, with an extensive international business network in various countries around the world. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

position: បុគ្គលិកប្រតិបត្តិផ្នែកលក់ (Executive, Project Sales)
Job Description:
Summary of Position

Responsible for collecting data and providing recommendations for market improvement.  Working and supporting customers to ensure that product is safely delivered on time through good communication with all parties.

What you will do:

Monitor and control individual sales to achieve the yearly target assigned by the supervisor
Work with supervisor to ensure understanding of the same direction
Provide good quality products and services to customers through communication with all parties
Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales
Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitored and collected following credit terms
Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What you should have:

Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Civil Engineering, or a related field
1 to 2 years minimum sales experience in a similar position within our industry will be preferred, and an added advantage
Competent knowledge of sales, and marketing methodology
Demonstrate excellent communication skills
Having a valid driving license is essential and one must be able to travel.

What we offer:

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. Job Description:
Procurement 
1. Handle the Procurement of Decoration and Contruction services;
•	Assist to prepare BOQ (Bill of Quantities) and RFQ (Request For Quotation) packages for selection purposes.
•	Assist to evaluate construction/decoration materials including prices, quality, and the availability in the market. 
•	Assist to clarify the BOQ and negotiate with vendors on the price quotation.
•	Asist to prepare the Procurement analysis and the selection process. 
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to review and prepare contractual documents with selected vendor.
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to prepare periodic selection of minor issue repairment or decoration.
•	Liaise and follow up with vendors for timely delivery.
•	Conduct site visit on random projects.
•	Ad hoc duties including supplier payment pressing, vendor feedback collection, and any other duties as assigned.
2. Handle the Procurement of Production items (i.e. Marketing tools, OCS desk, Sofa for VIP room, Logistic tools, Printing forms...etc);
•	Assist to prepare criteria/expectation checklist, and prepare RFQ (Request For Quotation) packages for selection purposes.
•	Assist to evaluate the material including prices, quality, and the availability in the market (on site). 
•	Assist to prepare the scoring, comparison, and the selection process. 
•	Assist to the Procurement Support team to review and prepare contractual documents with selected vendor (if needed).
•	Liaise and follow up with vendors for timely delivery.
•	Ad hoc duties including supplier payment pressing, supplier site visits, and any other duties as assigned.

3. Handle the disposal item bidding process (i.e. vehicle, motorbike, scape value items...etc);
•	Work with the Inventory unit and technical teams to find the estimate/starting price of the disposal items.
•	Form up Committee and prepare neccessary documents i.e. bidding conditions, announcement flyers..etc for approval.
•	Make an Announcement; make sure it notifies well/clearly to potential tenders.
•	Evaluate the price proposal and prepare the comparison.
•	Prepare documents close out the bidding.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor of Business Administration, Bachelor of Finance and Banking, or equivalent
•	Minimum 2 years in procurement.
•	Very good English and communication skills.
•	ERP system or other Procurement system usage. 
•	Basic computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, internet and email).
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   +855 (0) 78 38 38 26 recruitment.hq@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. +855 (0) 78 38 38 26

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
- Strategic planning and management of the entire product portfolio, across segments of branch network
and corporate banking
- Gain a deep understanding of customer experience, identify and fill product gaps and generate new
ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive grow
- Design & develop new products, pricing, offers, and positioning strategies in accordance with the bank’s
strategic priorities
- Drive product launches including working with Marcoms, executives, and other product management
team members
- Develop a sale promotion program, and act as the intermediary between sales & marketing department
- Evaluate promotional plans to ensure that they are consistent with product line strategy and that the
message is effectively conveyed
- Work closely with stakeholders to improve and enhance process efficiency. This will include process &
product documentation updates with the product committee
- Provide product training, support, and quality control
- Manage a team of product specialists
- Perform any other related duties as assigned by the management team/line manager where necessary.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 3 years’ experience in the financial sector, and managerial position/team lead
- At least Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting or Biz Admin or IT
- English proficiency, excellent in both writing and reading
- Strong computer literacy such as Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, Adobe LiveCycle, and Power BI is a
plus.

** Required Competencies
- Strong experience in a dynamic product management role
- Proven experience overseeing all elements of the product development lifecycle
- Previous experience delivering finely tuned product marketing strategies
- Highly effective cross-functional team management
- Experience using Flexcube 12 is a plus
- Proven ability to work under pressure and deliver outputs in a timely manner
- Negotiation and internal relationship building
- Good commercial knowledge and biz acumen
- Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority
- Ability to work on multiple projects in various stages simultaneously
- Business planning and project management
- Strong communication (including presentation and analytical skills)
- Accuracy, attention to detail, initiative to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

** How to apply
Please send your up-to-date resumé, a copy of your Cambodian ID card and a recent passport size (4x6)
photograph to: BRED Bank (Cambodia) Plc. No. 30, Preah Norodom Boulevard Sangkat Phsar Thmey 3, Khan
Daun Penh, Phnom Penh. Or email hr@bredcambodia.com
Company Profile: About BRED Bank Cambodia:Since first opening our doors in 2017, BRED Bank Cambodia has offered our clients the highest international standards while delivering a uniquely Cambodian banking experience.We provide our growing customer base with a smarter way to bank – tailoring the broad range of our products and services to each business or individual’s unique needs.BRED Bank, the first and only EU bank in Cambodia, is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the French banking group, BRED Banque Populaire, which has operations across Europe and an expanding global network. BRED Banque Populaire is part of BCPE, one of France’s largest banking groups with 36 million customers worldwide. Together, they bring customers more than 100 years of banking experience.
Contact Info: Contact Information Dim Daradorn  016604448 hr@bredcambodia.com No. 30, Preah Norodom Boulevard,Sangkat Phsar Thmey 3, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 016604448

Job Description:
- Meet and exceed the assigned sales and revenue targets though acquiring new
customers for deposit and lending products
- Manage and grow existing customer portfolio for FUM, loan, revenue and profitability
- Leverage and expand customer relationship to maximize referral, cross selling and
new business opportunities
- Contribute to the business success by initiating and participating in various coldcalling and marketing activities
- Provide high standard of service to all customers at all times
- Be always attentive to all customer needs, issues or complaints and provide
appropriate solutions and effective complaint handling
- Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow
the bank’s policies and compliance procedures
- Minimize and make immediate report on any potential financial or operational losses
- Stay updated with bank’s products suite, marketing campaigns and competitor’s
activities to ensure superior product knowledge
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Bachelor Degree
- OR lower degree accepted if at least 3 years' experience in similar position
- Computer literacy and English language proficiency (French language is a plus)
- Proven sales and service record in banking or related industries
- Financial background, analytical and credit background
Required competencies:
- Discretion, integrity and rigor
- Customer focus and strong communication skills
- Outgoing personality, confidence and ability to work under pressure
- Autonomous and pro-active
- Good planning, negotiation, problem solving & organizing skills
- Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
- Be a team player and like to deal with challenges

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

• Meet and exceed the assigned sales and revenue targets through acquiring new customers for deposits, Retail SMEs and other lending products.
Understand customers’ lending needs and provide suitable solutions through consultation.
Collecting supporting documents, and preparing credit memorandum with the provision of strong analysis, recommendation and business justification.
Manage and grow existing customer portfolio for FUM, loan, revenue and profitability.
Leverage and expand the customer relationships to maximize referral, cross-selling and new business opportunities.
Contribute to the business’s success by initiating and participating in various cold-calling and marketing activities.
Provide a high standard of service to all customers at all times and address all customer’s
complaints/issues in a professional manner.
Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the bank’s policies and compliance procedures.
Be vigilant on any early credit warning signs and make an immediate report on potential financial or operational losses.
Stay updated with the bank’s products suite, marketing campaigns and competitor activities to ensure superior product knowledge.
Job Requirement:
Required Education & Experience

- Minimum Bachelor Degree.
- OR lower degree accepted if at least 3 years experience in a similar position.
- Computer literacy and English language proficiency (the French language is a plus).
- Proven sales and service record in banking or related industries.
- Financial background and credit background.


** Required Competencies

- Discretion, integrity and rigour
- Customer focus and strong communication skills.
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to articulate complex issues.
- Confidence, pro-active and ability to work under pressure.
- Good planning, negotiation, problem-solving & organizing skills.
- Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities.
- Be a team player and like to deal with challenges.
