Job Description:
To carry out the reception and control of merchandise and its storage in the stockroom, in addition to store replenishment according to company procedures, in order to ensure the store has the right product at the right time.

RESPONSIBILITIES
STOCKROOM MANAGEMENT
• To receive and confirm boxes every day in an optimal manner.
• To open the boxes received in an organised and systematic manner, according to store needs.
• To organise and allocate the merchandise received according to stockroom guidelines.
• To perform daily replenishment on a continual basis, according to store needs.
• To reorganise stockroom space in an optimal manner according to the stage of the season and store needs – start of the season, sale period, etc.
• Responsibility for maintaining a clean and tidy stockroom.
• To carry out the re-labelling of garments as required (sale period, promotions, etc.).
• To perform transfers and pickings quickly and specifically according to instructions from managers.
• To participate actively and systematically in the end of season return, according to company guidelines.
• Responsibility for controlling and monitoring stockroom materials - alarms, Pathfinder, adhesive tape, etc.
• To collaborate in other store maintenance tasks, as required.o be able to deal with individual store requests quickly and efficiently.
PRODUCT
• To be familiar with the products of each season - collection, initial order, colours, sizes, etc.
• To use the different product lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, transmission, initial order, etc.).
• To participate in updating the Merchandising and Rotation rail.
• To collaborate in preparing all the material required to perform the store changes.
• To be able to recommend alternative garments when out of stock items are requested.
• To report to the team any issues that may affect sales (entries of repetitions, catalogue garments, etc.).
• Responsibility for organising and re-allocating surplus clothing.
• To be aware at all times of the newest products and what has been withdrawn to the stockroom.
• To deal with flaws in accordance with company standards.
Job Requirement:
• Proactive and able to take the initiative.
• Organised with a certain degree of autonomy.
• Flexible, adapts to the needs of the stockroom and the store.
• Good communicator – listens actively and communicates in a clear and structured manner.
• Manages his/her time efficiently.
• Committed and willing to improve.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Goods reception and handling standards and protocol.
• Procedure for transfers and goods returns.
• To be familiar with the different lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, initial order, out of stock items, repetitions, etc.).
• Partial inventories protocol.
• Basic Customer Service Standards.
• The entire collection - references, models, sizes, colours, etc.
• The Rankings and the most important product lists – Best Sellers, replenishments, etc.
• Organisation and application.
• Able to prioritise and commercially oriented.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall N/A

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Prince Mall (Sihanoukville) N/A

Job Description:
Specifically, this position will focus in the following areas, in order of priority:

Lead Through Values:
- Execute the company’s mission and values through your work – selfexplanatory and so important it gets its own section.

Hit Targets: 
- Hit Targets – Yes, that’s it. Whether engagement or people walking through showroom doors, use all your superpowers and experience to hit targets and be responsible if they fall short.

Creative Development:
- Market/Persona Development – Work with Brand Strategist and Sales to dive deep into the identity of the product customers; lead or find resources to find out what motivates future customers, what their concerns are, and the best ways to engage them.
- Understand the Product Identity – Each development has its own personality, and you help find out who that is. Working with the team you develop the identity of the project, how it will speak, what it wears, and how it portrays itself to the public.
- Develop the Big Ideas – Working both independently and with the team, come up with the big ideas that put the project together and for individual marketing campaigns.
- Keep Up and Share Ideas & Trends – Keep abreast of trends,
demographic changes, economic situations, and general situations to help provide new ideas for the changing market. Share and lead these insights into department operations and executions

Marketing & Communications Management
- Manage the Team – Be overall responsible for communications and marketing originating from ULS for ULS Corporate brand and all ULS projects.
- Writing & Art Direction – Serve as lead or co-author on all long-form writing for ULS and projects as needed; develop high-level art direction concepts for designers and content teams.
- Support Team – Help all members of the team both in coaching and technically as needed, including, but not limited to, graphic design assistance, photography, creative development, writing, management, etc.
- PMO High-Level Liaison – Work with MarCom Manager and Project Managers to help identify and understand both the high-level brand of their project and agree on general marketing directions.
- Team Operations – Assess team performance, and identify methods or tools to help improve skill sets, efficiency and communication and skills.
Job Requirement:
Education & Experience
- 8+ years working in Sales and Marketing, at least 3 years working at a director or senior level.
- 5+ years experience working in Cambodia and/or similar experience working on real estate projects.
- Four-year degree (or more) in Marketing, Communications,
Advertising, or a related field of study. If you studied something completely different, that is OK too, but your experience and cover letter should demonstrate why you have the skills to do the job.
- Demonstrated experience managing a team of eight or more of those with different skill sets.
- Experience building teams, including helping improve processes and workflow.
- Confidence with the Adobe and Microsoft suites – writing and
numbers are part of this job.

Other Details:
Working hours: Up to 44 hours per week; primary work days are Monday
to Friday with work outside of office hours required on occasions. Part
time remote work within the country also permitted.
Location: Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
Reports to: This position reports to Community Director.
Compensation: This position offers a competitive compensation package, including health insurance, company revenue sharing, and unlimited leave.

How to Apply:
Please send the following to jobs@urbanlivingsolutions.com and
use “I create th1ngs” in the subject line.
1. CV
2. Portfolio of past work (preferably a PDF)
3. A cover letter that provides the following stories:
4. One of your proudest creative moments: what it was and how it happened;
5. A management challenge you overcame and how you did it;
6. How you align with our mission and values.
This is a detailed application process. Applications that do not follow directions will not be considered

Job Description:
Job responsibilities and duties:
Internal/External Interactions: 
• Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
• Planning and Daily visits new customers\
• More regular, planned, and structured visit to provincial customers 
• Joint Target to improve groups performance in sales, penetration, and profit
• Joint calls to large Target fleet customers
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager/Senior Collection Officer/Senior Loan Recovery Officer about default customers and review previous months performance
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager to review previous months performance
• Collect quality applicant rather than quantity by doing careful credit assessment for approval request
• Train and coach sales team of dealers about financing 
• Ensure the effective communication maintained among team and other departments
• Report and update to the Dealer sale team about the application status
• Find out key potential growth of sale and recommend this to management
• Support recovery team and collection team if needed 
• Manage and delegate tasks to lending coordinator 
• Attend trainings as required by the management
Job Requirement:
Job requirements and qualifications:
Education/Certification:
• Bachelor or Master degree in business management or related field
• At least two years of experience in the similar position
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience:
ESSENTIAL:
• Multi tasks and strong organizational skill
• Good in problem solving
• Analytical skills
OTHERS:
• Creative, result-driven, able to take initiative.
• Business Management Ethic
• Strong team player
• Good in problem solving
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

job title: បុគ្គលិកធនធានមនុស្ស
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកធនធានមនុស្ស
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
- ជ្រើសរើសមនុស្សឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ ដោយក្នុងនោះត្រូវយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ទៅលើ អត្តចរិត សីលធម៍ ចំណេះដឹង បទពិសោធន៍ និងសុខភាពជាដើម។
- ផ្តល់ការអប់រំ បណ្តុះបណ្តាល អភិវឌ្ឍដើម្បីបំពេញមុខងារបានល្អ
- រក្សាធនធានមនុស្សល្អឱ្យគង់វង្ស

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• រៀបចំJD របស់បុគ្គលិក និងរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធ
• ចូលរួម និងរៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត ផែនការសកម្មភាពសម្រាប់ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល ដើម្បីជួយជ្រោមជ្រែងអោយក្រុម ហ៊ុនទាំងមូលសម្រេចគោលដៅ
• ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមប្រចាំឆមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• រៀបចំឯកសារវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• តាមដានការអនុវត្តបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងនិងគោលនយោបាយនានារបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ជំរុញ ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងជួយជ្រោមជ្រែងការងារជាប្រចាំ ដើម្បីជំរុញបុគ្គលិកធ្វើការអោយអស់ពីសក្តានុពល និងសម្រេចលទ្ធផលដែល រំពឹងទុក
• រៀបចំឯកសារផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនឹងការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការណែនាំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
• ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធក្នុងផ្នែក
Job Requirement:
Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ក្នុងវិស័យគ្រប់គ្រង ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើរ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្សចាប់ពី១ ឆ្នាំឡើង

Skill (ជំនាញ):
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ (Word, Excel, )
• តាក់តែងនិងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍គោលការណ៍ធនធានមនុស្ស ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវបរិយាកាសការងារល្អ
• ចេញលិខិតរដ្ឋបាលផ្សេងៗ ដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយនឹងបុគ្គលិក
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំផែនការធនធានមនុស្ស
• រៀបចំបច្ចេកវិទ្យាដែលអាចគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យព័ត៍មានរបស់បុគ្គលិក និងការគ្របគ្រងទិន្នន័យការងារ
• ជំនាញសម្របសម្រួលពីផ្នែកមួយទៅផ្នែកមួយ
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការជំរុញទឹកចិត្តក្រុមការងារក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ ឱ្យស្របតាមទស្សនវិស័យក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ជំនាញក្នុងការងារជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មី ត្រូវនឹងអ្វីដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនចង់បាន
• ជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំការវាយតម្លៃលើសកម្មភាពការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិក ការអង្កេតលើវិន័យ អាកប្បកិរិយា សីលធម៌របស់បុគ្គលិក

Physical Fitness (កាយសម្បទា):
• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• ស្មារតីវាងវៃ រហ័សរហួន

Personal Characteristics (បុគ្គលិកលក្ខិណៈផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន):
• ម៉ត់ចត់ និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ  និងការសហការល្អ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងទំនុកចិត្ត 
• ព្យាយាម និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
• ច្បាស់លាស់ និងគោរពពេលវេលា

job title: បុគ្គលិករៀបចំព័ត៍មានវត្ថុធាតុដើម
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិករៀបចំព័ត៍មានវត្ថុធាតុដើម
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
- ធ្វើការរក្សាទុកព័ត៍មាន (បញ្ជីបញ្ជាទិញរបស់អតិថិជន និងរក្សាការសំងាត់ជូនអតិថិជន)
- ខិតខំស្វែងយល់បន្ថែមពីគ្រឿងអលង្ការ និងចេះធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមដើម្បីអោយការងារកាន់តែរលូន

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• ប្រមូល និងរៀបចំព័ត៍មានគ្រឿងអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា

- Promote and Sell loan product or service to meet loan

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
•	Works with Users, Business Project Managers, IT Support Team, IT PMO, Finance, Commercial and other stakeholders to understand their needs and requirements and tailor appropriate solutions.

•	Work with Business Owners/Data Analyst to develop key business questions and to build datasets that answer those questions.

•	Improve data foundational procedures, guidelines and standards.

•	Perform additional data and database related tasks.
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

job title: Head of Credit Analysis and Securities
position: Head of Credit Analysis and Securities
Job Description: 1.	Policy development and refinement•	To support the risk department in setting up sound credit risk management and internal control frameworks. •	To recommend adjustments in these frameworks in accordance with the evolving organizational and sector realities. •	To develop and adjust the Credit Analysis and Securities Department tools to provide timely oversight of actions to be taken on late payments by the relevant departments in charge, as well as those eligible for guarantee claims.•	To support the COO in developing adapted performance management frameworks in line with the organization’s risk appetites as set by the board. •	To perform credit risk reassessment for relevant loan accounts per stated in the credit risk grading section. •	To annually review the credit risk grading policy to ensure compliance as well as operational feasibility.•	To support the risk department in developing risk appetites for validation at the board level.•	To input on proposals regarding new products as well as current product adjustments, ensuring that credit, operational and market risks are addressed and mitigated.2.	Portfolio oversight•	To monitor the portfolio exposure and ensure the early warning signs toward portfolio deterioration and ceiling have been communicated to senior management and relevant credit operations departments.•	To work with the relevant credit operation departments to ensure that SME loans oversight is being implemented strictly in accordance with credit policies.•	To provide reports on the gaps in implementation accordingly, to the COO, including recommendations on how to address these.•	Where relevant, to support the collections efforts on SME loans, including field visits to the delinquent customers.  •	Where relevant, and as directed by the COO, provide oversight on collections efforts outside the SME space. To provide approvals on higher value loans as per credit policy frameworks3.	Securities Oversight•	To keep a detailed record of the securities attached to each loan account.•	To aggregate the information on various securities attached to each loan account and present reports accordingly.•	To submit loans for guarantees as per agreements held with third-party guarantee funds, in a timely manner, and as directed by the loan committees.•	To process claims on the guarantees as per policies framing these.4.	Capacity building•	To develop training materials for building the capacity of relevant credit operation staff regarding to quality of credit assessment, credit management, and credit risk mitigation.•	To conduct the training for relevant credit operation staff per annual training plan for the agreed relevant courses.5.	Reporting•	To prepare the relevant reports under the portfolio guaranteed scheme and submit to various external and internal stakeholders on a timely manner.•	To support the risk department in preparing the credit risk monitoring report and submit to supervisor and related committees on a timely manner.•	Ensure timely and accurate delivery of information to Risk department for preparation of Credit Risk reports.
Job Requirement: -	Education – Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Marketing, Management, Economics, or related field.-	Experience – at least 5 years in credit operations-	Language – Can use the English language: listening, speaking, reading, and writing.-	Computer literacy/ tablet – MS office and MS Outlook, good at using excel-	Good data analytical skill-	Have a good interpersonal and communication skill, teamwork, independent, and result-oriented-	Ability to work without supervision-	Ability to solve the problem-	Good collaboration in work
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description: OpportunityResponsible for all vessel operations, ground operations.Key Responsibilities:Marine & Ground operations- In general, act as focal point to coordinate between various parties (ship, area office, customer service, sales, global service center, partners, terminal, suppliers etc) to ensure a smooth call of Sealand vessel to Cambodia port, and smooth daily ground operations.- Work with relevant parties to create optimal Berthing Plan for ships calling to Cambodia port in the way that ensure vessel can berth as early as possible, shorten port stay and depart as early as possible.- Work with terminal and relevant parties to deliver high berth/work productivity during port stay and monitor the load/discharge process.- Adjust Stowage plan for loading with Chief officer and terminal to ensure a high load/discharge productivity and high schedule reliability, safety.- Arrange and coordinate all vessel husbandry matters to ensure vessel smoothly arrive and depart.- Coordinate with relevant parties for all vessel/container incidents happening at local (twistlock, reefer damage, cargo transfer, vessel damage and etc)- Ensure port memo system correctly updated for Cambodia port.- Ensure all vessel reports are sent by relevant parties in timely manner (TDR, final load list, departure baplie, container damage report, seal mismatch and etc).- Coordinate with all relevant parties to set up new terminal, service call.- Arrange for loading late gate in container, outlist container as per agreement with related parties.- Work with terminal to get favorable proforma window as per request from Sealand HQ.- Work with local authority including Port Authority, Pilot, Police, Custom following instruction from manager.- Coordinate with Finance Business partner and other relevant parties to monitor and protect cost. In daily work, propose the operations solution that is cost optimal for the business.- Coordinate matters related to transportation plan such as cut off time, out of gauge (OOG) acceptance, dangerous goods (DG) acceptance.- Keep track of performance via KPI, take proper action to drive for improvement.- Proactively work with commercial team, Local Product and render support to deliver a good service to customer.- Support L&S volume/GP growth, support internal Intermodal/CHB business.- Continuously find way to improve process, SOP.- Coordinate with relevant parties to resolve any ad-hoc situation.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree level education in Business or other relevant discipline with 1-3 years’ work experience after graduation, in parallel with education or between degrees. Fresh Graduate is welcomed to apply.- An excellent command of spoken and written English.- Fast learner, team player, flexible in terms of working hours and work allocation assigned by management.- Willingness to work 24/7 in case required.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Lending Officer មន្ត្រីផ្ដល់ឥណទាន
position: Lending Officer មន្ត្រីផ្ដល់ឥណទាន
Job Description:
- Find potential clients to get the loan products and services in their geographic areas or boundaries. 
- Build a very good relationship with all levels of local authorities to get their supports on loan   documents process. 
- Analyze borrowers’ business plan and financial flows to get more and more reliable data and information related to their businesses income and family status.
- Assess and evaluate borrowers’ properties with the up to date market price and check the legal ownership.
- Educate the credit rule and policies strictly to borrowers before processing the loan documents.
- Set up the plan with OM for loan disbursement projection as monthly, quarterly and annually basis.
- Closely follow up the borrowers on their business change or any problems then report to direct supervisor for taking early action on time. Ensure the loan repayment with 100% & follow up.
- Work closely with marketing and product development officer to research competitor business strength and weakness and new product development.
- Make a daily report to OM for consolidating all data to make a daily client information and loan document submit record to OM.
Job Requirement:
- 3rd Year / 4th Year / Fresh graduate or Bachelor degree in banking management or equivalent encourage to apply.
- Honesty, initiative, flexibility, high commitment and good inter-personal and communication skills.
- Good working knowledge of computer (Ms. Office & Internet).
- Ability to effectively communicate in English and Khmer.
- Good understanding of Cambodian micro finance rules and regulations, law on real estate and contract law.
- Minimum 1 year relevant working experience with MFI or Bank.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To To participate in the recruitment of personnel in an active and optimal manner.
• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

Job Description:
Job purpose
Accountable for the overall function of the limousine service and dispatch vehicles and drivers to meet customer’s transportation needs. Conveys a high profile of the company by being neatly dressed and offering quality customer service courteously.

General Functions
 Ensures adherence to NagaWorld’s Code of Conduct, Internal Rules and Regulations at all times by constituent/s
 Adhere to Transport daily operation (manpower allotment, assigned areas, transport arrangement, immigration and airline arrangement)
 Prepare a copy of vehicle documentation inside vehicle (road tax, car inspection, car registration and insurance)
 Knowledgeable of Nagaworld facilities and amenities rendered to guest/s (product knowledge)
 Implementation of health and safety hygiene measures to guest/s and subordinates to avoid health risk hazard (ready face mask and alco-gel, if needed)
 Monitor and maintain amenities for guest/s in vehicle (wet tissue, umbrella, drinking water and towel)
 Notify superior immediately regarding guest/s concern/s
 Handle guest concerns properly by own capacity (notify superior immediately if unable to handle issue)
 Avoid causing inconvenience to guest, provide immediate solution when necessary
 Performs other duties as assigned by management.
 Securely transport guest/s passport from airport to VIP office in NagaWorld (All guest/s passport are placed in a secured lock bag and recorded prior to transfer process)
 Adherence to confidentiality policy (all guest’s personal details and information strictly private and confidential)
 Provide best convenience to arriving VIP guest/s while inside the vehicle
 Knowledgeable of tourist destination and landmarks
 Knowledgeable and updated on road access and Cambodian traffic laws
 Handle guest/s concern professionally, report any incident to Superior
 Prepares maps, directions, and other related materials inside vehicle;
 Anticipates and monitors schedule changes and adjusts resources accordingly; (quick response to scenarios, providing limo driver/s alternative routes)
 Communicates with colleagues directly or via radio to assist in the execution of their assignments;
 Interacts with Customer Service to receive and provide up to date information on reservation changes;
 Liaise with concerned VIP support team for VIP guest/s arrival and departure schedule.
 Maintain all H1 vehicles in tip top condition (report to superior for any issues)
 Responsible for caring for company vehicles and property (report to superior for any issues)
 Follow assigned schedule and roster (notify superior for any changes)
 Ensure proper grooming prior to heading to assigned area
 Understand and follow basic operational procedures of the department
 Clearly handover information to colleagues and superior/s
 Knowledge on basic repair of vehicle break down
 Give courtesy and treat guest politely at all times
 Ensure provide guest/s with service standards
 Have pass medical check with good eyesight and health
 Follow timely and accurate daily schedule
 Abide by Cambodian traffic laws (rule and regulations)
 Ensure to be qualified and have a professional driving license
 Adherence to company / department policies and procedure
 Follow road safety procedure

Job Description:
•	Collaborates with the emergency services team
•	Inspects the ambulance before each shift, such as the fuel, oil, transmission fluid, wiper fluid, and coolant, and reports any needed repairs 
•	Checks the first aid and medical supplies inventory levels before each shift and ensures the ambulance is well-equipped
•	Reports ambulance dispatch information to ICU Nurse leaders
•	Assists patients with stretching and loading them into the ambulance 
•	Drives an ambulance as quickly and safely to transport patients to the hospital
•	Provides first aid, CPR, or administers oxygen if the patient requires care before reaching the hospital
•	Sanitizes and cleans the ambulance and safely disposes of any medical waste and soiled linens
•	Maintains your driving log with daily entries and takes note of patient’s names and addresses, travel times, mileage, and service performed
•	Ensures the safety of the medical vehicle (ambulance) and reports at the earliest
•	Reports accident facts to medical personnel and police officers, when necessary 
•	Assists ER/ICU/IPD Nurses with patient daily care
•	Collects medical wastes in ER/ICU
•	Other tasks assigned by Managers
Job Requirement:
Job requirements:
•	Graduated from high school is recommended to apply
•	Valid driving license D2 up required
•	Understanding of the traffic rules
•	Language abilities: fluent in Khmer and be able to use English for communication
•	Willing to learn new things, improve knowledge and continue to learn
•	Ability to build good interpersonal relationships and work well in a team
•	Ability to work effectively under pressure, be flexible and prioritize job tasks

Working conditions: 
•	Working place: Sunrise Japan Hospital Phnom Penh
•	Working days: 5 days per week
•	Working hours:  2 shifts (based on the schedule)
-	Day: 8.00 – 18.00 (include 1-hour lunch break)
-	Night-shift: 17:00 – 9:00 (3 to 4 times per month)
•	Days off: in turn (rotation) of days off (2 days off per week)
	(If staff work on a public holiday, they get additional payment.)
•	Salary: Based on our policy/ Up to your achievement and contribution
•	Pay change: Twice a year (January and July)
•	Allowances: Overtime, night-shift allowance, commuting allowance, rental support allowance, 
	seniority payment, learning support, 13-month salary, and so on
•	Welfare: NSSF and Medical support by SJH

Job Description:
- Perform existing IT security gaps analyst to comply the regulation (NBC TRM).
- Develop up to date IT security policy, standards, and threats.
-Ensure that all new implementations of solutions are compliant with the security requirements, standards, and regulatory.
-Review IT change management and user access management to comply with current IT Policies and SOPs.
-Perform regular IT security reviews and produce IT assurance and compliance status reports.
-Provide IT security awareness for users.
-Create and manage risk register and work with various teams on ongoing basis to guide the on mitigation.
-Communicate between IT and internal/external audit on required assessments.
-Collaborate with management and the related IT Division to improve security posture.
-Document any security breaches and assess their damage.
-Coordinate and update information security incident response document to ensure processes and procedures are tested regularly in line with IT continuity, business continuity planning (BCP) and disaster recovery (DR) policy.
-Promote cyber security awareness posture at all levels of management and employees by maintaining and developing a positive culture of compliance against IT security policy, industry standards and regulations.
-All other matters ancillary to the above and to perform any other related issues that management may require from time to time.

- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent on Computer Science or Information Technology.
- 3 years experienced in IT security management, and IT Audit.
- Knowledge of IT Risk and Governance is preferred.

- Good in analytical skills.
- Good verbal and written English skills to present to senior management.

implementation• Review and design processes/working instructions for HSSE, operation IOP/SOP• Ensure BCP plan is still working when there is emergency/incident case happened• Ensure having significant guideline/instructions and acting in safe manners• Build up working structure to ensure any updated instructions reach to everyone and everyone is actively share and report unsafe act• Ensure PCP plan if needed• Initial and lead activities to have effectively results, zero incident and environmental• Conduct HSSE training to staffs and engage supply vendors to have the same activities• Conduct HSSE procedures in IT audit scopes and implement after approval.
- Examine IT internal controls, evaluate the design and operational effectiveness, determine exposure to risk and develop remediation strategies.
- Manage the timeframe for each audit mission as agreed to achieve the plan.
- The audit executions have followed the IT policy, procedure, and standard in order to ensure all kinds of IT
risks are covered, managed, and complied with.
- Perform regular audit testing and provide effective recommendations.
- Discuss and clarify the finding with the auditee to find a clear root cause.
- Keep more concerns in each process to ensure that the internal controls are in place.
- Quickly update to a supervisor if there is any suspicious case is discovered.
- Provide recommendations and guidance on identified security and control risks.
- Ensure the audit documents are fully completed information and stored after finish the audit mission.
- Ensure constant capacity building and up to the date of Phillip Bank's business performance.
- Other additional tasks are assigned by the line supervisor

* Audit Department
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Information Technology/Management Information Systems or related degree.
- Knowledge or experience of computer networking such as computer servers, virtualization, and network infrastructure devices (Switch, Router, and Firewall).
- Knowledge or experience of application development and database management.
- Concepts and knowledge of IT security standards and frameworks are more advantageous.
- Experiences at least 1 year in various IT positions such as software developer, network administrator,
database administrator, IT security or IT audit are more advantageous.
- Good understanding of internal control, process and risk analysis, IT security and Application control management knowledge.
- Good teamwork and auditing ethic.
- Good written and spoken English, communication and interpersonal skills.
- High motivation and ability to work under pressure and without supervision
- Able to travel to provinces

* Our packages are aligned to a “Pay for Performance” principle of rewarding &recognizing good performers.

1. 13th month salary
2. Pchum Ben bonus
3. Annual performance bonus or sales incentive
4. Seniority indemnity payment
5. Term life insurance coverage and personal accident & inpatient
6. Outpatient benefit
7. National Social Security Fund (NSSF)
8. Staff loans
9. Public holidays following Cambodia labor law
10. Leave benefits
11. Five working days per week

Job Description:
-	To acquires new loan customers
-	To evaluate loan applications and submit a comprehensive analyzed credit memo.
-	Ensure that bank’s credit principles and policies are followed and complied.
- Ensure that deviations from the bank’s credit management processes/procedures/policies are identified and properly addressed.   
-	Collect supporting documents from borrowers for the loan applications and to verify the repayment sources of income.
-	Conduct site visits and inspections where necessary to verify the applications and attend meeting with borrowers to discuss loan proposals to understand their businesses.
- Make sound recommendations based on quality analysis and ensure timely submission of the credit memos for approval.   
-	Be response to queries raised by Credit Risk Management Team on the loan applications. 
-	Monitor the loans review date and ensure prompt review of loans. 
-	Monitor progressive loans and post-disbursement conditions to ensure compliance of conditions imposed.
-	Ensure proper filing of documents for the Corporate Borrowers.
-	Liaise and follow up with CAD for the issuance of LO and loans releases.

-	Bachelor degree in banking and finance or related file
-	At least 2 years of experience in Banking  
-       Skills/knowledge in Loan processing and Sales 
-	Ability to acquires loan and deposit customer 
-      Sound written and verbal English communication skills. Chinese Speaking is an additional advantage 
-     Computer Skills (Ms. Word, Excel, and Power Point).

Job Description:
- Solicits potential and existing clients in accordance with the guidelines stated in the loan policies and procedures.
- Prepare/check loan documents (English and Khmer) in accordance with credit approvals including Letter of Offer, Facility Agreement, Hypothec Agreement and Guarantee Agreement etc.
- Coordinate/guide/coach and support branch staff to prepare security document/help them to correct mistake.
- Liaise with relevant local authorities/panel lawyer to perfect the loan documents.
- Monitor and follow up post-drawdown condition with branch compliance with approved terms & conditions.
- Prepare internal Loan and NBC report
- Prepare documents for loan settlement
- Check the loan documents upon execution by borrowers and attested by lawyers which shall include the followings:
- All agreements are properly signed including conditions precedent and security documents
- Correct dates are inserted
- All pages are initialed
- Read the memorandum and Articles of Association of the corporate borrower or security provider to determine that the company can borrow or provide the assets as security respectively, corporate authorization and procedures for execution of documents and affixing of company seal.
- Corporate seals and personal seals are affixed when required
- Board/Shareholders resolutions (when required) are executed by the proper authority
-  Evidence of Filing and/or registration when required
-  Prepare disbursement checklist to ensure the Terms & Conditions is complied
- Ensure safe keeping all the loan securities documents
- To contact customer for insurance renewal, fire and life
- All other matters ancillary to the above and to perform any other related duties that Management may require from time to time.

* Credit Admin Department
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in the field of banking and finance, accounting, economic, law or other equivalent.
- At least 1-year experience in Microfinance/Bank.
- High motivation, initiative, willing and able to travel to the field.
- Ability to work against tight deadlines and within time constraints
- Computer Skills (Ms. Word, Excel, and Power Point).
- A person of being responsible, analytical, detail-oriented, and passionate to new invention
- Good knowledge in Microsoft, Advance Excel, and Core Banking System
- Proactive, flexible and a good team player
- Ability on problem solving and good communication skills
- Good behavior, committed and disciplined
- Good Understanding of English both spoken and written

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
- Prepare legal document and submit to HQ for checking.
- Make appointment with lawyer for customer acceptance
- Review and re-check Loan Agreement, Hypothec Agreement, legal document, and Collateral/Security
Documents before sending to authority/panel lawyer
- Controlling and monitoring Credit Committee Loan minute approving which send by Senior SME Lending
Support at Head Office.
- Help Branch Manager to share Memo, guideline, and follow up with users to ensure that they are
compliance
- Maintain customer information confidentiality.
- Recording and tracking client’s Collateral information into core banking system.
- Safe keeping all client’s documents such as Client Information, Loan Document, and Collateral/Security
Document by following policy and procedure.
- Coordinate related works with Credit Admin HO.
- Coordinate with Credit Admin HO to monitor the expiration of insurance policies and renew the fire and life
insurance.
- Others task as assign by supervisor.

* Monivong Branch
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in the field of banking and finance, accounting, economic, law or other equivalent.
- At least 1-year experience in Microfinance/Bank.
- Have strong numeric and administrative skill.
- Negotiation and internal relationship building.
- Sound written and verbal English communication skills.
- Advanced Computer Skills (Ms. Word, Excel, and Power Point).
- Ability on problem solving and good communication skills.
- Good behavior committed and disciplined.

* Our packages are aligned to a “Pay for Performance” principle of rewarding & recognizing good performers.
1. 13th month salary
2. Pchum Ben bonus
3. Annual performance bonus or sales incentive
4. Seniority indemnity payment
5. Term life insurance coverage and personal accident & inpatient
6. Outpatient benefit
7. National Social Security Fund (NSSF)
8. Staff loans
9. Public holidays following Cambodia labor law
10. Leave benefits
11. Five working days per week
